meanings.definition: A television show or movie that is broadcast again.
meanings.sent1: I watched a rerun of my favorite show last night.
meanings.sent2: The rerun of the movie was even better the second time.
meanings.sent3: The rerun of the show made me laugh just as much as the first time.
meanings.sent4: Watching the rerun felt like visiting an old friend.
meanings.sent5: The rerun brought back all the memories of watching it the first time.

meanings.definition: To broadcast a television show or movie again.
meanings.sent1: They will rerun the episode next week for those who missed it.
meanings.sent2: I rerun the movie for my friends who hadn't seen it before.
meanings.sent3: She decided to rerun the show to share it with her family.
meanings.sent4: Rerunning the film allowed more people to enjoy it.
meanings.sent5: The network will rerun the series for fans who want to watch it again.
